panels.description: Total Requests Per Cluster, by Request Type

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_latency_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Request Throughputs

panels.description: Total Timeouts, Failures, Unavailable Rates for each cluster

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_failures_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_timeouts_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_unavailables_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_unfinished_commit_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_condition_not_met_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_contention_histogram_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Error throughputs

panels.description: Part of reads in the total of standard requests (Reads+Writes). CAS, Views, ... operations are ignored.

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_latency_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type="read"}[1m:30s])) / ignoring (request_type) (sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_latency_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type="read"}[1m:30s])) + ignoring (request_type) sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(mcac_client_request_latency_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type="write"}[1m:30s])))

panels.title: Read / Write Distribution

panels.description: Read latency for coordinated reads

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum(rate(mcac_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type="read"}[5m])) by (le, cluster))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(mcac_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type="read"}[5m])) by (le, cluster))
histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(mcac_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type="read"}[5m])) by (le, cluster))

panels.title: Read Latency (98 - 999th percentile)

panels.description: Write latency for coordinated writes

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum(rate(mcac_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type="write"}[5m])) by (le, cluster))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(mcac_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type="write"}[5m])) by (le, cluster))
histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(mcac_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type="write"}[5m])) by (le, cluster))

panels.title: Write Latency (98th - p999 Percentile)

panels.description: Other p99 latencies for coordinated requests

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(mcac_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", request_type!~"write|read|.*-.*"}[1m:30s])) by (le, request_type, cluster))

panels.title: Other Latencies

panels.description: Nodes Status uses Internal/Gossip activity. Be mindful that if Native or Thrift protocol are disabled, the nodes won't be reachable, and still marked up

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (changes(mcac_thread_pools_completed_tasks{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", pool_name="gossip_stage"}[2m:30s])) > bool 0

panels.title: Nodes Status

panels.description: Nodes up and down in the cluster

targets.expr: count by (cluster) (max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (collectd_collectd_queue_length{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}))

panels.title: Nodes Count

panels.description: Nodes up and down in the cluster per protocol/activity

targets.expr: count by (cluster) (max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (collectd_collectd_queue_length{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}))

sum by (cluster) (max by (cluster, datacenter, rack, instance) (changes(mcac_thread_pools_completed_tasks{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", pool_name="native"}[2m:30s])) > bool 0)

sum by (cluster) (max by (cluster, datacenter, rack, instance) (changes(mcac_thread_pools_completed_tasks{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node", pool_name="gossip_stage"}[2m:30s])) > bool 0)

panels.title: Nodes Status History

panels.description: Disk space used ordered (fullest disks first)
panels.title: Disk Space Usage

panels.description: Total sizes of the data on distinct nodes

targets.expr: sum by (cluster) (mcac_table_live_disk_space_used_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
sum by (cluster) (mcac_table_total_disk_space_used_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Cassandra cluster Data Size

panels.description: SSTable Count Max and Average per table

targets.expr: max by (cluster, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_live_ss_table_count{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
max by (cluster) (mcac_table_live_ss_table_count{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: SSTable Count

panels.description: Maximum pending compactions on any node in the cluster

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (mcac_table_pending_compactions{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
min by (cluster) (mcac_table_pending_compactions{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster) (mcac_table_pending_compactions{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Compactions

panels.description: Maximum pending compactions per table

targets.expr: max by (cluster, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_pending_compactions{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Compactions per Table

panels.description: Cluster wide pending threads, by thread pool name

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, pool_name) (mcac_thread_pools_pending_tasks{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Tasks

panels.description: Cluster wide blocked threads, by thread pool name

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, pool_name) (rate(mcac_thread_pools_total_blocked_tasks_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Blocked Tasks

panels.description: Dropped messages rate summed by message type and cluster

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, message_type) (rate(mcac_dropped_message_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Dropped Messages

panels.description: active threads summed per cluster

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, pool_name) (mcac_thread_pools_active_tasks{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Active Tasks

panels.description: Sum of hints being handed off per cluster.

targets.expr: sum by (cluster) (mcac_storage_total_hints_in_progress_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Hinted Handoff

panels.description: Maximum CPU utilisation (max 100%)

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{type="idle", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

min by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{type="idle", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

avg by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{type="idle", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Max Unix load on a node for a cluster

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (collectd_load_shortterm{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
min by (cluster) (collectd_load_shortterm{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster) (collectd_load_shortterm{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Unix Load (1m rate)

panels.description: Maximum Memory allocated per usage (worst node) - excludes caches, buffers, etc

targets.expr: min by (cluster) (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (collectd_memory{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}))
max by (cluster, memory) (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, memory) (collectd_memory{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}))

panels.title: Memory Utilisation

panels.description: Disk read throughput

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (rate(collectd_processes_disk_octets_read_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
min by (cluster) (rate(collectd_processes_disk_octets_read_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
avg by (cluster) (rate(collectd_processes_disk_octets_read_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Disk Read Thoughput

panels.description: Disk write throughput

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (rate(collectd_processes_disk_octets_write_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
min by (cluster) (rate(collectd_processes_disk_octets_write_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
avg by (cluster) (rate(collectd_processes_disk_octets_write_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Disk Write Thoughput

panels.description: Network In and Out per cluster

targets.expr: sum by (cluster) (rate(collectd_interface_if_octets_rx_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster) (rate(collectd_interface_if_octets_rx_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Network I/O

panels.description: Percentage of the time the node is *not* doing a GC, thus Cassandra is not stopped for GC

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / 1000))
min by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / 1000))
avg by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / 1000))

panels.title: Application Throughput (% time NOT doing GC)

panels.description: Garbage collection duration

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
min by (cluster) (rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
avg by (cluster) (rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Garbage Collection Time

panels.description: Maximum JVM Heap Memory size (worst node) and minimum available heap size

targets.expr:
max by (cluster)
        (mcac_jvm_memory_used{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

min by (cluster)
        (mcac_jvm_memory_used{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

avg by (cluster)
        (mcac_jvm_memory_used{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

min by ( cluster)
        (mcac_jvm_memory_max{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: JVM Heap Memory Utilisation
